column2: aalamelakxaawi denegaaga sabeowi masalaate
obe aalame nenaaye kulome sabaate tafateroowi keberitene nemaaerine zayegahaasune sabeowi masalaatene meqhebaale masarite natzaanate, fetehhene salaamene sela zekxona,

nesabeowi masalaate obe gemete zayemeetaawene metehhaasene nehhelenaa wadi sabe zaqhusalane orimeenaawi tagebaaraate zaseaabane mekxwaanu , naaye zaribaane emenatene natzaanate zalawaa, kaabe ferehhene tzagamene natzaa zekxonate aalame neketehelewe zelaaala temenite daqi sabaate mekxwaanu sela zetaomenalu,
wadi sabe melekine watzeaane nemewegaade hhaayeli neketeqame meeneti kayegedade sabeowi masalaate behhegi kekxebaru odelaayi selazekxona,
obe manego haagaraate mehhezenataawi zemedenaataate nekxeaabi mehhegaaze odelaayi selazekxona,

hezebetaate wedebe hheburaate manegesetaate obe chaaretare wedebe hheburaate manegesetaate nemasaritaawi sabeowi masalaate, nekxeberene leelenatene sabeowi feture, nemaaeri masalaate daqi tabaaeteyone daqi oneseteyone zalawome emenate bemeregegaatzomene obe zesafehha natzaanate kaaa maahhebaraawi meebaalane zehhasha darijaa manabaaberone nemezeregaahhe zewasanune selazekxona,

obaale manegesetaate mese wedebe hheburaate manegesetaate bemetehhegegaaze sabeowi masalaatene masaritaawi natzaanataatene aalamelakxaawi tematane hhaalawaane meeneti kerikxebu nemetzeaare zetelebu selazekxona,
ezi telabe’zi maliu nekerigaagatze bezaaebaa ezome masalaatene natzaanataatene eziotome hhaabaaraawi genezaaba mehhaaze betaaemi odelaayi selazekxona,
selazi hhaafashaawi gubaaee wedebe hheburaate manegesetaate

kulome hezebetaatene kulome haagaraatene kesaabe hhedehhede weleqasabene kesaabe hhedehhede kefeli maahhebarite sabene nazi denegaaga ezi kulu gizee bemezekaare ezome masalaate eziotome okxeberote nekerikxebu bemesetemehaarene betemeheretene neketzeeru, kameu’wene behaagaraawene aalamelakxaawene maaebaleti segumetitaate  obe hezebetaate obaale haagaraatene obe gezeotome obe zalawu hezebetaatene hhaafashaawene geberaawene taqhabaalenatene hhaalawaane meeneti kerikxebu nazi aalamelakxaawi denegaaga sabeowi masalaate owijewo olo.
aaneqatze 1
bemanetzere keberene masalene kulome sabaate eneteweladu natzaane maaerine eyome. meseteweaalene hhelenaane zetaaadalome bemekxwaanome nehhedehhedome behhewenataawi manefase ketahhaalaalayu olawome.
aaneqatze 2

hhedehhede sabe bezarei, beqalame, betzotaa, beqwaaneqwaa, behaayemaanote, bepolatikaa waye bekaaleote orioeyaataate, bebeheere waye bemaahhebaraawi mabaqwale, behaabeti, beteweledi waye bekaaleote darijaataate odelewo enetayetagaberilu obezi denegaaga ezi naaye zesafaru kulome masalaatene natzaanataatene tatenyemi eyu.

betawasaakxi hhaada zeegaa, haagaru natzaa gezeote, bemogezite zemahhaadare, aaresa memehhedaare zayebelu waye obe tehheti zekxona yekxune luolaawi gadabe zerekabe enetakxona’wene bemekxeneyaate naaye haagaru polatikaawi, hhegaawi seletaane waye aalamelakxaawi darijaa odelewo oyefetzamone.
aaneqatze 3
hhedehhede sabe beheyewate naaye menebaare, naaye natzaanatene dehhenenatene masale olawo.
aaneqatze 4
hhedehhede sabe bebaarenate waye begileyaanate kegezaae yabelune. baarenatene naaye baareyaa negedene bezekxona yekxune malekeu kelekule eyu.
aaneqatze 5
hhedehhede sabe kabide seqhaaye zawerede, chekaana zemaleo, isabeowi waye sabeowi keberu zawaarede otahhaahhezaa waye maqhetzaaeti oyefetzamone,
aaneqatze 6
hhedehhede sabe obe zekxona yekxune botaa obe qedemi hhegi besabeowi manenatu nekefelate masale olawo.
aaneqatze 7

kulome sabaate obe qedemi hhegi maaeri obe leeli mekxwaanome bezaye ofalaalaaye naaye hhegi maaeri hhaalawaa kegebarilome masale olawome. kulome sabaate nazi denegaaga’zi bemetehhaasene nazi denegaaga’zi nemetehhaase bezegebaru meleeaalaatene kaabe zebatzehhome odelewo hhaalawaa naaye merekaabe maaeri masale olawome.
aaneqatze 8
hhedehhede sabe behhega manegeseti waye behhegi zetafaqhadulu masaritaawi masalaate enetetehhaasewo seletaane bezalawo haagaraawi beete feredi gebue kaahhesaa naaye merekaabe masale olawo.
aaneqatze 9
hhedehhede sabe behhegi kaabe zetadanegaga sereaate watzaai oyeesarene, oyetahhaazene waye oyehheyarene.
aaneqatze 10

hhedehhede sabe masalune gebuene, kameu’wene nezeqharebalu zekxona yekxune gabanaawi kesi zemelekatu gudaayaate nemewesaane obe natzaane zayeodelaawene beete feredi befetehhaawene elaawene manegadi nekeraaoyulu melue maaerenate olawo.
aaneqatze 11
bezaqhetzee gabane zetakxasasa hhedehhede sabe makalaakxaliu oqheribu obe zekaataaalu ewaane behhegi gabananyaa mekxwaanu kesaabe zerigaagatze kamenetzuhe sabe keqhutzare masale olawo.

hhedehhede sabe hhaada nagare obe zetafatzamalu ewaane nati gudaaye mefetzaame waye zayemefetzaame gabane mekxwaanu behaagaraawi waye beaalamelakxaawi hhegi tadanegigu kesaabe zayetzanehha behhaalaafenate oyehhetatene. kameu’wene nati gabane obe zefatzamalu ewaane nati gabane tawasinu kaabe zenabari maqhetzaaeti nelaaeli zekxabede maqhetzaaeti kewesano oyegebaaene.
aaneqatze 12

hhedehhede sabe behhegi kaabe zetadanegaga sereaate watzaai obe leeli weleqa heyewatu , beetasabu, gazeu waye obe rekebaatu taalenye zeotewo oyehelewene. obe leeli keberune zeneune badale oyefetzamone. zekxona yekxune sabe kameziome kaabe zeomasalu ide oetaawenate waye kaaa badale zekalaakxalalu wehhesenate hhegi naaye merekaabe masale olawo.
aaneqatze 13
hhedehhede sabe obe wesheti zenaberilu haagare naaye mezewewaarene menebaarene masale olawo.
hhedehhede sabe kaabe zekxonate tekxune haagare enekolaaye kaabe haagaru naaye mewetzaaene enedaganaa naabe haagaru naaye memelaasene masale olawo.
aaneqatze 14
hhedehhede sabe kaabe neheyewatu hhaadaganyaa zekxonu gefeetaate omelitu obe kaaleote haagaraate uqhebaa naaye mehhetaatene naaye merekaabene masale olawo.
ezi masale ezi bechebute polatikaawi obe zayekonu gabanaate waye neelaamaataatene mamerehhetaatene wedebe hheburaate manegesetaate obe zetzaariru tagebaaraate oyagalegelene.
aaneqatze 15
hhedehhede sabe zeegenate naaye merekaabe masale olawo.
hhedehhede sabe behhegi kaabe zetadanegaga sereaate watzaai zeegenatu keqhenetete waye zeegenatu naaye melewaate masalu kekxelekale oyekxeelene.
aaneqatze 16

neaaqhema odaamene heewaanene zebatzehhu daqi tabaaeteyone daqi oneseteyone zarei, zeegenate waye haayemaanote enetayegadabome naaye memereaawene beetasabe naaye memeseraatene masale olawome. obe omasaraaretaa hhaadaare , obe ewaane hhaadaarene obe ewaane fetehhene maaeri masale olawome.
mareaa benatzaane melue fetaawene tamaraaaaweti teraaye yefetzame
beetasabe tafateroowene masaritaawene gujela hheberitasabe eyu. selazekxona kaabe hheberitasabene kaabe manegesetene hhaalawaa naaye merekaabe masale olawo.
aaneqatze 17
hhedehhede sabe bewelequ yekxune mese kaaleote behhaabaare neberite naaye mewenaane masale olawo.
hhedehhede sabe behhegi kaabe zetadanegaga sereaate watzaai neberitu oyewerisene.
aaneqatze 18

hhedehhede sabe naaye otahhasaasebaa , hhelenaane haayemaanotene natzaanate olawo. ezi masale ezi hhedehhede sabe haayemaanotu waye emenatu nemelewaate , kameu’wene nebehhetu waye mese kaaleote behhaabaare koyenu beeli waye beweleqa bezaaebaa haayemaanotu waye emenatu kesabekxe , ketegebere, kamelekxe waye kabeele nezalawo natzaanatu yateqhaalele.
aaneqatze 19

hhedehhede sabe naaye mehhesaabene hhaasaabu naaye megelaatzene natzaanate olawo. ezi masale ezi bezaye ide oetaawenate baaelaawi otahhaasaasebaa naaye mehhaaze , bezaye naaye dobe maaegati kaabe zekxona yekxune meelaa maraakxabi hhaabaweetaane hhaasaabene naaye menedaaye, meqhebaalene metehhelelaafene natzaanate’wene yateqhaalele.
aaneqatze 20
hhedehhede sabe besalaame naaye meekaabene mewedaabene natzaanate masale olawo.
hhedehhede sabe bemaahhebare nekxewedabe oyegedadene.
aaneqatze 21
hhedehhede sabe beqatetaa waye benatzaa maritzaa bezetamaritzu wakaletu obilu obe manegeseti haagaru naaye mesetaafe masale olawo.
hhedehhede sabe behezebaawi ogalegelotaate haagaru bemaaeri naaye metenyeme masale olawo.

deleyate hezebi masarite seletaane manegeseti kekxawene olawo. ezi deleyate ezi bemesetire waye betamasaasaali manegadi babegizeeu bezekaayade, kulu bemaaeri zesaatafalune oteqhaalaalene bezekxona tekxekelanyaane natzaane naaye medemaatze sereaate kegelatze olawo.
aaneqatze 22

hhedehhede sabe obaale hheberitasabe kame mekxwaanu matene masale maahhebaraawi wehhesenate olawo. kameu’wene behaagaraawi tzaaerene beaalame lakxaawi metehhebebaarene mese wedaabane haabetene hhedehhede manegeseti bezesamaamaae malekeu nekeberune nenatzaa ebeete sabeowi manenatune odelayeti zekxonu qutebaawi, maahhebaraawene baahelaawene masalaatu kerigaagatzulu masale olawo.
aaneqatze 23
hhedehhede sabe neseraahhe , nenatzaa maritzaa aayenate seraahhe, nefetehhaawene mechuene kunataate seraahhene seraahhe kayeseene nezegebare hhaalawaane masale olawo.
hhedehhede sabe bezaye odelewo nehhaada aayenate seraahhe maaeri kefelite naaye merekaabe masale olawo.

hhedehhede obe seraahhe zerekabe sabe sabeowi keberune keberi beetasabune zehhelawalu odelaayi enetakxoyenu’wene bekaaleote maahhebaraawi wehhesenataate zedegafe fetehhaawene zatabaabeene tzaamaa rihaatzu naaye merekaabe masale olawo.
hhedehhede sabe ribehhaataatu nemeregegaatze maahhebaraawi moyaa naaye meteyaashene obaale naaye mekxwaanene masale olawo.
aaneqatze 24
hhedehhede sabe naaye seraahhe saaate erifeti, naaye mazanaagei gizee, kameu’wene fetehhaawi matene saaataate seraahhene mahaayaa zekxefalalome hezebaawi beaalaatene kehelewuwo masale olawo.
aaneqatze 25

hhedehhede sabe neteenaane dehhenatene aaresune beetasabune zebaqee darijaa manabaabero enekolaaye megebi, kedaane , manebari gazaa, hhekemenaane odelayeti maahhebaraawi ogalegelotaatene naaye merekaabe masale olawo. kameu’wene seraahhe eneteseene , enetehhaameme, okaala gudue enetekxawene kaabe sabe hhaadaare hhaadiome enetemawete, eneteshemegele waye kaaleote leeli qutzetzeru zekxonu tzagamaate manabaabero enetagaatemewo dehhenatu nekehhelawalu masale olawo.

odeetaatene hetzaanaatene feluye kenekenene hhaagazene naaye merekaabe masale olawome. behhegaawi waye bezayehhegaawi mareaa zeweladu kulome hetzaanaate bemaaeri maahhebaraawi hhaalawaa naaye merekaabe masale olawome.
aaneqatze 26

hhedehhede sabe edele temehereti naaye merekaabe masale olawo. temehereti enetawehhaada obe qadaamaayene masaritaawene bereketaate benatzaa kewahaabe olawo. temehereti qadaamaaye bereki gedenataawi kekxawene olawo. teekenikaawene moyaawene temehereti behhaafashaa kemaalaae olawo. edele laaelawaaye bereki temehereti demaa obe beqheaate tamaseritu bemaaeri kewahaabe olawo.

temehereti obe melue meebaala sabeowi feturene obe metenekxaarene mekxebaarene sabeowi masalaatene masaritaawi natzaanataatene zatakori kekxawene olawo. temehereti obe manego kulome manegesetaate , zareowi waye haayemaanotaawi gujelataate, merededaae, mekeeolene mehhezenatene zamaaebele kekxawene olawo. betawasaakxi wedebe hheburaate manegesetaate salaame nemeenyebe nezakaayedome tagebaaraate kehhegeze olawo.
aaneqatze 27

hhedehhede sabe obe baahelaawi heyewate hheberitasabe benatzaa nekesaatafe, kaabe kinate tatenyemi kekxawene, obe saayenesaawi meebaala betzehhitu nekabareketene kaabe wetzeitu neketeqamene masale olawo.
hhedehhede sabe baaelu kaabe zefatero saayenesaawi, sena tzehhufaawi waye kinataawi wetzeitaate moraalaawene newaataawene ribehhaataatu nekehhelawulu masale olawo.
aaneqatze 28
zekxona yekxune sabe obezi denegaaga ezi zesafaru masalaatene natzaanataatene zerigaagatzalu maahhebaraawene aalame lakxaawene sereaate naaye merekaabe masale olawo.
aaneqatze 29
zekxona yekxune sabe nati behhetaawi marigaagatzi natzaane zetamaaleaane meebaala sabeowi manenatu zekxona hheberitasabe zefetzemome gebuote olawuwo.

zekxona yekxune sabe obe oteqhaaqhemaa masalaatune natzaanataatune nemasalaatene natzaanataatene kaaleote nemeqhebaalene nemekxebaarene, obe hhaada dimokeraasiyaawi hheberitasabe zadeleyu sena megebaare, tzatetaane dehhenatene nememelaaene tabaahilu behhegi nezetawasanulu maaeqabaate teraahhe tagazaai yekxawene.
ezome masalaatene natzaanataatene eziotome bezekxona yekxune manegadi onetzaare elaamaataatene mamerehhetaatene wedebe hheburaate manegesetaate ketegebaru oyekxeelune.
aaneqatze 30

kaabe wesheti ezi denegaaga ezi zekxona yekxune manegeseti, gujela waye weleqa sabe, obezi denegaaga ezi kaabe zesafaru masalaatene natzaanataatene negaliome nemetehhaase obe zeaalama meneqeseqhaase nekesaatafe waye zekxona yekxune tagebaare nekefetzeme masale kame zalawo zehhebere tagayeru zeteregome wesaana yalane.
